member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_COMPRESSED_BITSTREAM
member.summary: Encapsulates the compressed bitstream output for the encoding operation.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_COMPRESSED_BITSTREAM.pBuffer
member.summary: A pointer to a containing the compressed bitstream buffer. Note that the resource buffer size is not the available size for this encoding operation because FrameStartOffset needs to be taken into account against this size.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_COMPRESSED_BITSTREAM.FrameStartOffset
member.summary: A UINT64 specifying th offset into the compressed bitstream where the encoder may start adding the current frame output.
